markdown:
In this club, membership fees and payment requirements are structured with meticulous detail. Memberships become active upon payment receipt, with a mandatory New Member Orientation within two weeks of payment [Doc:1#Chunk:1]. Changes in membership status are effective the month following Board approval. Specific transfer scenarios include Foundation transfers to children with a transfer fee equal to the current Foundation initiation fee plus taxes [Doc:1#Chunk:1]. Surviving spouses of Foundation, Golfing Senior, Social, or Social Former Foundation Members can request transfer to surviving spouse status upon the member's death [Doc:1#Chunk:1].

I. MEMBERSHIP CATEGORIES & INITIATION FEES
- New members must pay an initiation fee unless waived by the Board [Doc:1#Chunk:1].

II. TRANSFER FEES & SCENARIOS
- Foundation transfers to children require a transfer fee equal to the current Foundation initiation fee plus taxes [Doc:1#Chunk:1].
- Surviving spouses of specific membership categories can request transfer to surviving spouse status upon the member's death [Doc:1#Chunk:1].

III. REINSTATEMENT PROVISIONS
- No specific information provided in the source notes.

IV. PAYMENT & BILLING REQUIREMENTS
- Membership activation upon payment receipt with a mandatory New Member Orientation within two weeks [Doc:1#Chunk:1].

V. AGE-BASED PROVISIONS & RESTRICTIONS
- No specific age requirements mentioned in the source notes.

VI. SPECIAL PROGRAMS & PROVISIONS
- No specific information provided in the source notes.

VII. ADDITIONAL FEES & REQUIREMENTS
- No additional fees or requirements detailed in the source notes.
